org.ldaptive.provider.apache

Class ApacheLdapConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.provider.AbstractProviderConnectionFactory<ApacheLdapProviderConfig>
      • org.ldaptive.provider.apache.ApacheLdapConnectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderConnectionFactory<ApacheLdapProviderConfig>

    public class ApacheLdapConnectionFactory
extends AbstractProviderConnectionFactory<ApacheLdapProviderConfig>
    Creates ldap connections using the Apache LdapNetworkConnection class.
